title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8203.3 - Contents of data
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8203.3 - Contents of data

State Regulations
(a) CYIMIS data
shall be updated monthly. (b) The
council shall respond promptly to alleged errors in CYIMIS data brought to the
council's attention. If the council determines that there is an error and that
the council is responsible for such error, the council shall promptly take
corrective action. If the council determines that there is an error and that
the council is not responsible for such error, the council shall notify the
participating agency which furnished the CYIMIS data of the alleged
error. (c) The council shall
respond promptly to all corrections from participating agencies. (d) Systematic and periodic audits shall be
performed to ensure the accuracy and integrity of all CYIMIS data. Corrective
action shall be promptly taken when errors or inaccuracies are
discovered. (e) Duplicate data
tapes shall be created to protect against the loss of data due to mechanical
failures, accidents or other emergencies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8203.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
